steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on button_download_katalon_package
step 4: At Page_home click on button_close_download_popup
step 5: At Page_home click on button_settings
step 6: At Page_home click on hyperlink_organization_management --> navigate to Page_admin_settings
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_admin_settings
